name: Tactical Warm Compress Bandaging
title: Ifa: Tactical Warm Compress Bandaging
in_play_description: When your Ifa, who has this card equipped, is on the field and you trigger Anemo-Related Reactions or Electro-Charged, heal the character on your team who has taken the most DMG for 1 HP. (Twice per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Ifa to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Fast Action: Equip this to your Ifa to heal the character on your team who has taken the most DMG for 1 HP.
When your Ifa, who has this card equipped, is on the field and you trigger Anemo-Related Reactions or Electro-Charged, heal the character on your team who has taken the most DMG for 1 HP. (Twice per Round)
(You must have Ifa in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
